title: Map cross-repository dependencies across all Zendesk org repos
description:
Analyze and document dependencies between Zendesk organization repositories. This includes:
- Import/require statements
- Package dependencies
- Service-to-service calls
- Shared libraries
- API integrations

See ZENDESK_REPOS.md for the complete list of 1000 repositories.

title: Map CODEOWNERS across all Zendesk org repos
description:
Document code ownership across Zendesk organization repositories. This includes:
- Parse CODEOWNERS files from each repo
- Map teams to repositories
- Identify ownership patterns
- Document coverage gaps
- Create ownership matrix

See ZENDESK_REPOS.md for the complete list of 1000 repositories.
